data.text: I‚Äôm sorry. This is just plain dangerous advice. You can put enough force with a hose clamp to crush the carbon tubing and risk sudden catastrophic failure. Padding it with a rubber band is not going to prevent that.

data.text: Coming from an engineering background and also a Cytech mechanic I always think putting things on a carbon fork is asking for trouble. I know people do it but your trusting you life on that fork not giving way. Some are very very thin.
